full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES SHING SHIS BA BRJOD NAS ME TOG CHAR LTA BU BEBS PAR BYA'O, ,DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG SKYA RENGS DKAR PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI MCHOD 'GROG AE MCHI BKA' BCU DAN NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KAS RANG GZHAN LA PHAN BSAM GYIS SOG YUL 'DI GAR ME LHA MCHOD CING GA-YANG BLANGS PA'I BKRA SHIS PA 'BYUNG 'DUG KYANG, LHA BSKYED PA MCHOD PA'I BYIN BRLABS SSOGS PA'I ME D PA'I SOGS YIG TSIG LHAG CAN GYI LUGS 'DZIN PA 'GA' SNANG MDO, ,RANG SKYEL LHA BSKYED CHOD ZHIG BYED DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA NGOR MCHOG SBYIN SREG THAB BSKYED PA DANG, SLOB DPON PADMA 'BYUNG GNAS RGYAL PO KHRI SRONG SDE BTZAN LA GNANG SO BYED GTOR MA GSAL BA BSGRIGS BKOD, ,'GRO BA RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,GNYER SPYOD LNGA SPEL TSIG DANG BCAS PA LUG GI BRANG DANG MAR KHU DANG CHANG 'BUL SOGS NI NOM CHID KA'U SHI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
